author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
Quote Arlo Guthrie
“… ’cause you want to know if I’m moral
Enough to join the army, burn women, kids, houses and villages after bein’ a
Litterbug”
From Alice’s Restaurant Massacree

author: Mr. Natch
content: What you need is warriors with an on/off switch.

author: Allan S
content: The rot is embedded, and can’t be excised. Two countries disbanded their airborne regiments because of stupid shit. Canada and Belgium felt their airborne unit could not be redeemed so bye bye.

author: Willy
content:
Alas a few rotten eggs make the group look bad.
Thankfully they can be weeded out.
